name: The Voice Designer
author: Data Driven Design

sections.description:
CREATE A VOICE-VERSION OF YOUR WEBSITE IN MINUTES (NO CODING)

The Voice Designer allows you to pull content directly from the pages on your WordPress website and create a custom conversation via the easy drag-and-drop canvas to build your own voice-based version of your website for both Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.

The Voice Designer WordPress Plug-in

Introducing a low cost way for all businesses to increase visibility and relevancy via integrating voice-based applications like Alexa Skills and Google Actions into their digital presence.

Learn more about using The Voice Designer
sections.installation:
HOW IT WORKS

We’ve prepared a series of video tutorials to help you build Alexa Skills and Google Actions using our WordPress Plug-in, The Voice Designer.

Please see our full instructions here
sections.changelog:
0.3.1

  • Updated readme.txt

0.3

  • Updated dependency management strategy due to problems with PHAR archive

0.2

  • Updated readme.txt
  • Composer dependencies packaged into a PHAR with humbug/box to prevent namespace conflicts with other plugins that use Composer
  • Use plugin-update-checker library to manage updates when installed from downloaded ZIP

0.1

  • Initial release.

short_description: TURN YOUR WORDPRESS WEBSITE INTO AN ALEXA SKILL & GOOGLE ACTION. Use our plug-in to design and deploy Voice Apps directly from your WordPress Admin.
